metadata.description: Multiple-choice questions about football player club teammate relationships in English and Cantonese
metadata.purpose: Cantonese benchmark for testing LLM understanding of football club player relationships
metadata.answer_format: Player pairs (e.g., "Player A and Player B")
metadata.format: Four choices (A, B, C, D) with one correct answer (actual club teammates) and three distractors (non-teammates)
metadata.note: Focuses specifically on club teammates, not national team teammates

questions.question: Which two players below have been teammates in the same club before?
questions.question_cantonese: 以下邊對球員曾經喺同一間球會做過隊友？

choices_cantonese.A: 尼古拉斯奧達文迪同阿拿祖
choices_cantonese.B: 迪維斯同馬些路波索域
choices_cantonese.C: 伊巴謙莫域同謝洛美·保定
choices_cantonese.D: 蘇卡迪斯同伊斯高

explanations.D: They were teammates at Real Betis Balompié

explanations_cantonese.D: 佢哋喺皇家貝迪斯足球會做過隊友
